name: radioactivity_concentration_of_229Ra_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Ra" means the element "radium" and "229Ra" is the isotope "radium-229" with a half-life of 1.16e-17 days.
